name: Polyhedron
description:
Smash 4th-dimensional objects by typing codes on your keyboard!

Get the best score in this frenetic game!

(Your heartbeat will go through the roof) Also, watch out for photosensitivity.

In each round, you have ten seconds to complete the code, and it goes harder and HARDER!

Mathias Davril (Skeptes) made the code, game design, and visual effects.

Antoine Lag (Squash) made all the sprites.
